    Function reference

    Data download

    Functions to download data inputs from remote repositories.

    download_globalbedo()
    Download 1km albedo data
    download_hadukdaily()
    Downloads 1km historic climata data for the UK
    download_ukcp18()
    Download UKCP18 climate data ILya comment: function needs fixing to handle cases where length(member) or length (collection) > 1 (or make clear you only want one at a time). Note that with collection='land-rcm', it can download 12 model runs numbered, 1 & 4-15. I.e. 2 & 3 don't exist

    Data (pre)processing and summary functions

    Functions that prepare or check data inputs.

    blendtemp_hadukera5()
    Blends Met Office and ERA5 data to produce hourly 1km resolution temperature data
    checkinputs()
    Check and summarise coarse resolution climate data inputs
    create_ukcpsst_data()
    Create UKCP sea surface temperature rast stack from ncdf files
    change_rast_units()
    Convert units and values of a SpatRast
    era5toclimarray()
    convert era4 ncdf4 file to format required for model
    ukcp18toclimarray()
    convert UKCP18 ncdf4 files to format required for model
    correct_ukcp_dates()
    Corrects time series of UKCP18 360 day year data to valid calendar dates
    find_ukcp_decade()
    Find UKCP18 decades containing timeseries of data
    get_ukcp18_dates()
    Gets dates of UKCP18 ncdf file
    fill_calendar_data()
    Converts 360-day yearly timeseries of UKCP18 raster data to actual calendar data
    read_climdata()
    Read climate data
    write_climdata()
    Write climate data
    plot_q_layers()
    Plots chosen layers from raster stack corresponding to selected quantiles of spatial mean
    plot_timestats_r()
    Plot timeseries plots of spatial mean, min and max values by various timesteps
    plot_wind()
    Plot 'star' or 'radar' chart of wind cardinal directions

    Spatial downscaling

    Downscaling from coarse to fine spatial resolutions.

    spatialdownscale()
    Spatially downscale all climate variables
    precipdownscale()
    Downscale precipitation accounting for elevation effects
    presdownscale()
    Downscale pressure with elevation effects
    relhumdownscale()
    Downscale relative humidity accounting for downscaled temperature
    swdownscale()
    Downscale shortwave radiation
    tempdownscale()
    Downscale temperature
    Tpsdownscale()
    Performs thin-plate spline downscaling
    winddownscale()
    Downscale wind speed accounting for elevation and terrain sheltering effects

    Temporal downscaling

    For example daily to hourly downscaling.

    hourlytemp()
    Derives hourly temperature from daily data
    subdailyrain()
    Estimate sub-daily rainfall from daily rainfall

    Bias correction

    Create and apply models of bias comparing modelled with historical observed data.

    biascorrect()
    Applies bias correction to one climate variable
    biascorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to climate variable
    correct_era5temps()
    Applies bias correction to UK era5 temperature data
    precipcorrect()
    Applies bias correction to precipitation data
    precipcorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to precipitation data

    Mesoclimate processes

    Mechanistic modelling of mesoclimate mechanisms.

    flowacc()
    Calculates accumulated flow
    difprop()
    Calculates the diffuse fraction from incoming shortwave radiation
    coastalexposure()
    Calculates land to sea ratio in upwind direction
    clearskyrad()
    Calculates clear sky radiation
    basindelin()
    delineate hydrological or cold-air drainage basins
    windelev()
    derive wind terrain adjustment coefficient
    lapserate()
    Calculate Lapse rates

    Data

    Datasets included with package.

    era5input
    A list of ERA5 climate data
    era5sst
    A 0.25 degree grid resolution dataset of sea-surface temperature data
    landsea
    A 100m grid resolution landsea mask
    ukcp18lookup
    A model member lookup table for different UKCP18 collections
    ukcp18sst
    A ~0.1 degree grid resolution dataset of UKCP18 sea-surface temperature data for NW Europe
    ukcpinput
    A list of 12km resolution UKCP18 regional climate data

    Worker functions

    Internal functions called by functions in mesoclim

    basindelin()
    delineate hydrological or cold-air drainage basins
    biascorrect()
    Applies bias correction to one climate variable
    biascorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to climate variable
    blendtemp_hadukera5()
    Blends Met Office and ERA5 data to produce hourly 1km resolution temperature data
    change_rast_units()
    Convert units and values of a SpatRast
    checkinputs()
    Check and summarise coarse resolution climate data inputs
    clearskyrad()
    Calculates clear sky radiation
    coastalexposure()
    Calculates land to sea ratio in upwind direction
    converthumidity()
    Converts between different humidity types
    correct_era5temps()
    Applies bias correction to UK era5 temperature data
    correct_ukcp_dates()
    Corrects time series of UKCP18 360 day year data to valid calendar dates
    create_ukcpsst_data()
    Create UKCP sea surface temperature rast stack from ncdf files
    daylength()
    Calculates day length
    difprop()
    Calculates the diffuse fraction from incoming shortwave radiation
    .basindelin()
    Internal function for delineating basins with option for boundary > 0
    .basindelinCpp()
    Wrapper for C++ function
    .basindelin_big()
    Function used for delineating basins with big dtms
    .basinmerge()
    Merge basins based on specified boundary
    .basinmosaic()
    Mosaic tiled basins merging common joins
    .cadpotential()
    Calculate cold-air drainage potential (spatial)
    .cfcelev()
    Appply elevation adjustment to cloud fractional cover
    .clearskyrad()
    Calculate clear sky radiation
    .correctcoastal()
    function for applying correction factor to coastal effects to account for data resolution
    .dewpoint()
    Calculate dewpoint
    .docolumn()
    Do an entire column of tiled basins
    .ehr()
    expand daily array to hourly array
    .flowdir()
    Calculate flow direction
    .is()
    Check if input is a SpatRaster or PackedSpatRaster and convert to matrix or array if it is
    .jday()
    Calculates the astronomical Julian day
    .latlongfromrast()
    Get latitude and longitude of centre of r
    .latsfromr()
    Produces a matrix of latitudes form a terra::SpatRaster object Inputs: r - a terra::SpatRaster object Returns a matrix of latidues
    .lonsfromr()
    Produces a matrix of longitudes form a terra::SpatRaster object Inputs: r - a terra::SpatRaster object Returns a matrix of longitudes
    .mav()
    Calculate moving average
    .multi_download()
    ILya: Have changed this to an internal function, including calls to it.
    .rast()
    Create SpatRaster object using a template
    .resample()
    version of terra resample that equates to NA.RM = TRUE r1 resampled to same geometry as r2 msk=TRUE if output to be masked out where r2 cells = NA method for resample and project can be set
    .rta()
    Convert matrix or rast to array
    .satvap()
    Calculate saturated vapour pressure
    .simpatch()
    Simulate cloud or rain patchiness
    .solalt()
    Calculates the solar altitude
    .soltime()
    Calculates solar time
    .spatinterp()
    Spatially interpolate missing values in Spatrasters
    .tempcad()
    Downscale temperature with cold air drainage effects
    .tempelev()
    Downscales temperature for elevation effects
    .tmeinterp()
    Temporal interpolation of Spatraster timeseries
    .vta()
    Convert vector to array
    .windcoef()
    Calculates wind shelter coefficient in specified direction
    .windz()
    Calculates wind altitude coefficient in specified direction
    download_globalbedo()
    Download 1km albedo data
    download_hadukdaily()
    Downloads 1km historic climata data for the UK
    download_ukcp18()
    Download UKCP18 climate data ILya comment: function needs fixing to handle cases where length(member) or length (collection) > 1 (or make clear you only want one at a time). Note that with collection='land-rcm', it can download 12 model runs numbered, 1 & 4-15. I.e. 2 & 3 don't exist
    era5input
    A list of ERA5 climate data
    era5sst
    A 0.25 degree grid resolution dataset of sea-surface temperature data
    era5toclimarray()
    convert era4 ncdf4 file to format required for model
    fill_calendar_data()
    Converts 360-day yearly timeseries of UKCP18 raster data to actual calendar data
    find_ukcp_decade()
    Find UKCP18 decades containing timeseries of data
    flowacc()
    Calculates accumulated flow
    get_dem()
    terra version of microclima get_dem require(elevatr)
    get_ukcp18_dates()
    Gets dates of UKCP18 ncdf file
    hourlytemp()
    Derives hourly temperature from daily data
    hum_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly relative humidity
    invls_calc()
    This function returns a numeric matrix identifying matching values from a raster that intersect with a set of points
    landsea
    A 100m grid resolution landsea mask
    lapserate()
    Calculate Lapse rates
    plot_q_layers()
    Plots chosen layers from raster stack corresponding to selected quantiles of spatial mean
    plot_timestats_r()
    Plot timeseries plots of spatial mean, min and max values by various timesteps
    plot_wind()
    Plot 'star' or 'radar' chart of wind cardinal directions
    precipcorrect()
    Applies bias correction to precipitation data
    precipcorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to precipitation data
    precipdownscale()
    Downscale precipitation accounting for elevation effects
    presdownscale()
    Downscale pressure with elevation effects
    pres_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly atmospheric pressure
    read_climdata()
    Read climate data
    relhumdownscale()
    Downscale relative humidity accounting for downscaled temperature
    skyem_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly downward longwave radiation
    spatialdownscale()
    Spatially downscale all climate variables
    subdailyrain()
    Estimate sub-daily rainfall from daily rainfall
    swdownscale()
    Downscale shortwave radiation
    swrad_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly shortwave radiation
    tempdownscale()
    Downscale temperature
    Tpsdownscale()
    Performs thin-plate spline downscaling
    ukcp18lookup
    A model member lookup table for different UKCP18 collections
    ukcp18sst
    A ~0.1 degree grid resolution dataset of UKCP18 sea-surface temperature data for NW Europe
    ukcp18toclimarray()
    convert UKCP18 ncdf4 files to format required for model
    ukcpinput
    A list of 12km resolution UKCP18 regional climate data
    winddownscale()
    Downscale wind speed accounting for elevation and terrain sheltering effects
    windelev()
    derive wind terrain adjustment coefficient
    wind_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly wind speed downscake
    write_climdata()
    Write climate data
